Hi, Iâ€™m Ahmad Shoja, and I graduated from the University of Amirkabir-arak in 2021 with a bachelor's degree in Computer Software Engineering.</br> My interests are in Front End and Android Engineering, and I love to create well-structured and clean coded products which can be easily maintained.</br> previously worked at team pooya-tech, where we take startup projects from customers in
